hadiths.english_translation: Narrated from Habib ibn Abi Thabit: Seventy-three years have passed over me. Abu Bakr ibn Ayyash said: In Kufa there were three people unmatched by any fourth: Habib ibn Abi Thabit, al-Hakam ibn Utaybah, and Hammad ibn Abi Sulayman. These three were the authorities on legal rulings (muftis), they were famous, and there was not anyone in Kufa except that they humbled themselves before Habib. Al-Fadl ibn Dukain and Muhammad ibn Umar reported that Habib ibn Abi Thabit died in the year 119 AH. It was narrated to me from Hafs ibn Ghiyath who said: I saw Habib ibn Abi Thabit as a tall man, one-eyed.
